name: Exponent, Inc.
description: Exponent, Inc. is a leading engineering and scientific consulting firm that specializes in providing solutions in various fields, including engineering, environmental science, and health and safety. Founded in 1967, Exponent has built a reputation for its technical expertise and ability to address complex problems across a diverse range of industries. The company employs a multidisciplinary team of scientists, engineers, and technical specialists who work collaboratively to deliver innovative solutions to clients. Exponent's services include failure analysis, product testing, litigation support, and regulatory compliance, among others. With a focus on integrating science and engineering, Exponent is committed to helping organizations navigate challenges and improve the safety and performance of their products and processes. The firm operates on a global scale, serving clients from various sectors such as transportation, construction, pharmaceuticals, and technology. Exponent's mission is to leverage scientific principles to provide clients with actionable insights that lead to informed decision-making and enhanced operational efficiency.
ceo: Paul A. M. K. H. P. M. T. P. M. R. H. A. J. A. C. A. E. B. C. A.
